name: Untitled Shipping Company Game: That's Super Fun and Very Serious
name_original: Untitled Shipping Company Game: That's Super Fun and Very Serious
description:
What is this game:

My friend at work learned I went to school to become a game designer. Ever since then he has been giving me ideas of a shipping game to make. Here are the results. I made this game in the course of weekend, so it is relatively short but I did somehow manage to add replayability into it. 

The goal of the game is to find the missing package and return it to the mail room. That missing package can spawn in about 25 different spots.

For completionist that want to play the game you will need to:

  1. Find all 4 Jerry the Wizard's
  2. Locate 5 toy turtles
  3. Return the lost package
Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Left Mouse Click to pick up items
  • 'E' Key to talk to Jerry's
